title: Description of elk population change from graph

content.prompt: Which of the following best describes the change in the elk population since the introduction of wolves into Yellowstone in 1995?

choices.label: The elk population steadily increased in numbers.
The elk population steadily decreased in numbers.
The elk population remained stable, experiencing little changes.
The elk population reached carrying capacity and experienced overshoot.

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Describe relationships among variables in data represented.
